DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation effectiveness sunscreen product determine Sun Protection Factor ( SPF ) skin human subject .
DOC.brief_title: Sun Protection Factor ( SPF ) / UVA Protection Factor ( UVAPF ) - Assay
DOC.criteria: Male female age 18 70 year inclusive ; Fitzpatrick Skin Type I , II and/or III SPF testing ; Good health determine CRO Subject History Form ( SHF ) ; Signed date Informed Consent Form ; Signed date Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act ( HIPAA ) Form ; An unambiguous minimal erythema dose ( MED ) .
